<<<<<<< HEAD
An extempore sermon, preached upon malt, by a way of caution to good fellows; at the request of two schollars, / by a lover of ale, out of a hallow [sic] tree. Lover of ale. Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
[s.n.], Printed at London ; and reprinted at Edinburgh : 1691.
Attributed to John Dod by Wing (2nd ed.). Caption title. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
=======
